Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lincoln
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswe observed a large white object in the sky. at first it appeared to be a satellite, but it was much larger and much brighter than satellites are. it was definitely at a high distance in the sky, but appeared to be lowered than airplanes, which were also visible at higher altitudes. the object glowed all white, but brighter than a full moon appears. there were no flashing red\green lights as used by aircraft or helicopters and the object was closer than other airplanes in the sky at the time, whose red\green flashing lights we could clearly see. at first, the movement was smooth and in one direction, moving from northern sky to southern sky. then the object changed direction and headed west briefly. then it reversed direction and began heading east. the changes in movement were abrupt, but appeared to occur smoothly. then the object stopped completely. a dead stop. we watched it completely motionless for about 20 to 30 seconds. as we were discussing what we were watching, the object distinctly rose directly into the sky, straight up from where it had been stopped, becoming smaller and smaller and smaller, eventually becoming just a small red dot - and then it vanished. there was no sound of any kind. the entire observation lasted about two minutes for me, three minutes for my daughter who first saw it moving and called me. this is the second time i have seen a ufo, but my previous experience was in 1977 and i was laughed at when i tried to report it to the police. i was also ridiculed back then by friends and others, so i stopped talking about it. there was no place to make a report like i am making now.
Summary: Large white orb in the sky that changed direction then rose into sky
